article_title: 'Ali was born in wartime. He died in front of the world'
sentence: In  March  the  BBC  reported  the  story  of  Ali  ,  a  Palestinian  baby  boy  who  had  recently  died  of  malnutrition  and  dehydration  at  northern  Gaza's  only  paediatrics  hospital.

article_title: 'Ali was born in wartime. He died in front of the world'
sentence: We  tried  to  get  him  treated  at  hospitals,  but  there  was  no  help. . .  Ali  died  in  front  of  the  entire  world,  which  kept  watching  him  pass  away.
